moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Local User Account Hash Carver
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module will change a local user's password directly in the registry.
author: p3nt4

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: pass
options.description: Password, NTHash or LM:NT hashes value to set as the user's password
